## DockerImageInstance interface

Components that provide a Docker image can implement this interface to allow other components to get information about the Docker image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DockerImageInstance 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [image](./cloud.dockerimageinstance.image.md) | <code>ImageInfo &#124; undefined</code> | Returns information about the version of the Docker image that reflects the current set of props for the component. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [latestImage()](./cloud.dockerimageinstance.latestimage.md) | Returns information about the most current version of the Docker image that has completed building, even if that version does not reflect the current set of props for the component. |
